just me Netorare netori netorase don't only happen with partners it might as well be with family members with no sexual relationship or even platonic love interests The key in the meaning is having a LOVED ONE  stolen from someone . And even though most people mistakenly equate the two  netorare and cuckold are not really the  same thing as cuckold implies a sexual relationship of sorts like a husband or a girlfriend unlike netorare which could be applied to a mother or a sister.

IIRC, Netorare and Netori are basically the same shit, the difference being in the perspective.    Netorare- your or someone's partner gets stolen while Netori- you do the stealing (the story gets told from the perspective of the one doing the stealing).  Netorase on the other hand is when one side willingly wants their partner to sleep with others.     As you can see NTR has many forms and vanilla is boring ;D
